GSD.product_version: versions from v4.10 to before v4.14.283
GSD.description:
net: ipv6: unexport __init-annotated seg6_hmac_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.283 by commit 64aef8efe96c1616142c4476a05731306fc4494e, it was introduced in version v4.10 by commit bf355b8d2c30a289232042cacc1cfaea4923936c. For more details please see the references link.
